tags.name: d2l-applied-filters
tags.description: A multi-select-list allowing the user to see (and remove) the currently applied filters.

attributes.name: for
attributes.description: REQUIRED: The id of the "d2l-filter-dropdown" that you want to track

properties.name: for
properties.description: REQUIRED: The id of the "d2l-filter-dropdown" that you want to track

attributes.name: search-value
attributes.description: Sets the value in the search input, useful if setting up the filter in a default state

attributes.name: category-text
attributes.description: REQUIRED: Name of the filter category, will be shown on the tab

attributes.name: disable-search
attributes.description: Hides the search bar inside a filter tab

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Unique id to represent a filter category, sent back in category events

attributes.name: selected-option-count
attributes.description: The number of selected filter options for that filter category.  When options are selected and de-selected, the consumer is responsible for updating this number after updating its own data store.

properties.name: searchValue
properties.description: Sets the value in the search input, useful if setting up the filter in a default state

properties.name: categoryText
properties.description: REQUIRED: Name of the filter category, will be shown on the tab

properties.name: disableSearch
properties.description: Hides the search bar inside a filter tab

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique id to represent a filter category, sent back in category events

properties.name: selectedOptionCount
properties.description: The number of selected filter options for that filter category.  When options are selected and de-selected, the consumer is responsible for updating this number after updating its own data store.

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-category-slotchange
events.description: Dispatched when the slot content changes

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-category-selected
events.description: Dispatched when a filter tab is selected

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-category-searched
events.description: Dispatched when a filter category is searched

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-option-change
events.description: Dispatched when a filter option is selected

slots.description: Contains the filters (e.g., d2l-filter-dropdown-option) that are in the category

tags.name: d2l-filter-dropdown
tags.description: A component containing filter options and emitting selection events

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the dropdown opener

attributes.name: disable-opener-text-variation
attributes.description: Disables displaying different text for different number of selections, instead always displaying the term for no selections.

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description: Sets the text for the filter content header

attributes.name: max-width
attributes.description: Sets the max-width of the filter dropdown

attributes.name: min-width
attributes.description: Sets the min-width of the filter dropdown

attributes.name: opener-text
attributes.description: Sets the text for the opener when there are no selections

attributes.name: opener-text-multiple
attributes.description: Sets the text for the opener when there are multiple selections

attributes.name: opener-text-single
attributes.description: Sets the text for the opener when there is a single selection

attributes.name: total-selected-option-count
attributes.description: The total number of selected filter options across all categories.  When options are selected and de-selected, the consumer is responsible for updating this number after updating its own data store.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables the dropdown opener

properties.name: disableOpenerTextVariation
properties.description: Disables displaying different text for different number of selections, instead always displaying the term for no selections.

properties.name: headerText
properties.description: Sets the text for the filter content header

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: Sets the max-width of the filter dropdown

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: Sets the min-width of the filter dropdown

properties.name: openerText
properties.description: Sets the text for the opener when there are no selections

properties.name: openerTextMultiple
properties.description: Sets the text for the opener when there are multiple selections

properties.name: openerTextSingle
properties.description: Sets the text for the opener when there is a single selection

properties.name: totalSelectedOptionCount
properties.description: The total number of selected filter options across all categories.  When options are selected and de-selected, the consumer is responsible for updating this number after updating its own data store.

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-cleared
events.description: Dispatched when the clear button is pressed to clear all filters

events.name: d2l-filter-dropdown-close
events.description: Dispatched when the filter dropdown is closed

slots.description: Contents of the dropdown, including filter categories and options

tags.name: d2l-search-facets-grouping
tags.description: A grouping of search facet options that keeps tracks of selected options

attributes.name: has-more
attributes.description:
Indicates whether this grouping has more options to be added later. Controls
the visibility of the 'More' button

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: The name of the grouping

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the grouping name

properties.name: hasMore
properties.description:
Indicates whether this grouping has more options to be added later. Controls
the visibility of the 'More' button

properties.name: text
properties.description: The name of the grouping

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the grouping name

events.name: d2l-search-facets-grouping-change
events.description: Dispatched when the search group changes

events.name: d2l-search-facets-grouping-has-more
events.description: Dispatched when the more button is clicked

slots.description: Contains the search facets in the group

tags.name: d2l-search-facets-option
tags.description: Search facet option, with a count to display the number of results

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description:
Whether the option is selected or not. This property matches the value of
the d2l-input-checkbox

attributes.name: count
attributes.description: The number of search results for this option

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether this option should be disabled

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: The text for this option

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of this option

properties.name: checked
properties.description:
Whether the option is selected or not. This property matches the value of
the d2l-input-checkbox

properties.name: count
properties.description: The number of search results for this option

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether this option should be disabled

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text for this option

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of this option

events.name: d2l-search-facets-option-change
events.description: Dispatched when the checked value of an option changes

tags.name: d2l-search-facets
tags.description: Polymer-based web component for D2L search facets.

events.name: d2l-search-facets-change
events.description: Dispatched when the search facets group changes

tags.name: d2l-search-results-count
tags.description:
`<d2l-search-results-count>`
Polymer-based web component for D2L search result

attributes.name: range-start
attributes.description: Range start

attributes.name: range-end
attributes.description: Range end

attributes.name: total-count
attributes.description: Total count

attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Search query

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description: Range start

properties.name: rangeEnd
properties.description: Range end

properties.name: totalCount
properties.description: Total count

properties.name: query
properties.description: Search query

tags.name: d2l-sort-by-dropdown-option
tags.description: A dropdown option menu item component.

tags.name: d2l-sort-by-dropdown
tags.description: Polymer-based web component for D2L sort by dropdown component

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Whether this dropdown should be disabled

attributes.name: compact
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the dropdown is in compact mode or not. The selection text
will not be visible when compact is true

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Alignment of dropdown menu

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label for the dropdown-menu

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the currently selected option

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether this dropdown should be disabled

properties.name: compact
properties.description:
Indicates whether the dropdown is in compact mode or not. The selection text
will not be visible when compact is true

properties.name: align
properties.description: Alignment of dropdown menu

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label for the dropdown-menu

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the currently selected option
